policy:
# METADATA
# custom:
#   plainid:
#     policyId: d61d554a-6d96-4af3-87b3-6727432ddc4e
#     name: policy2
#     accessType: Allow
#     policyUse: DYNAMIC_AUTHORIZATION_SERVICE
#     sourceEnvironmentId: a5f8e3f0-1791-42de-af06-e9b9c4a23b2c
#     applications: 
#       - id: App
#       - id: Access-file
package policy
import rego.v1

# METADATA
# custom:
#   plainid:
#     kind: DynamicGroup
#     name: User All Users
#     id: 9c1bfd12-d8b9-456e-bc0a-de3ed2a144b4
#     description: "Predefined Dynamic Group. All Users contains all organization's users defined in the IDP"
dynamic_group(identity) if {
	identity.template == "User"
}

# METADATA
# custom:
#   plainid:
#     kind: Ruleset
#     name: RS
#     id: c83bbb2a-6bd8-468d-8e37-bf1b268f685f
ruleset(asset, identity, requestParams, action) if {
	asset.template == "request-asset-type"
	asset["location"] == "NY"
	action.id in ["access"]
}
